title: Special Days
description: Birthdays, holidays, and transition days as an opportunity

steps.title: Background
steps.description:
Parents who lost their child often confess some dates in the year are harder and sadder than others.

The child’s birthday, transition day, holidays and memorials are common examples.

Some parents avoid family gatherings altogether to avoid the feelings of emptiness of not having the child there.

This process will aid you to reconnect these future special dates with the presence and appreciation of having ${hchildName} in your life.

steps.title: Eliciting future birthday - Feeling
steps.description: As you think about ${hchildName}'s next birthday now, how do you feel?

steps.title: Eliciting future birthday - Proceed?
steps.description:
Great! So this process will do one of three things for you:

1. Increase the good feelings even more
2. Will provide some new ways to experience ${hchildName}'s future birthdays, transition days and holidays
3. Will do nothing, since you already feel good

Would you like to continue this process or proceed to the next one?

answers.text: Why not, let’s give it a go!
Let’s proceed to the next process

steps.title: Eliciting future birthday - Description
steps.description: And as you think about ${hchildName}’s next birthday now, what image comes to mind?
steps.notes: Make sure this is an image of the birthday itself, and not your response to/about the birthday. I.e. if you have an image of yourself crying about it, you can put that image aside, and think of ${hchildName}’s next birthday in terms of what you valued and feel loss/sad about.

steps.title: Eliciting future birthday - Validating
steps.description:
${echo}

Now just to make sure, this is what you valued and didn't want to lose, correct?

answers.text: Actually, let me choose something else

steps.title: Break state
steps.description:
${echo}

Great, and you can set that image aside for now, we'll transform it soon

steps.title: Eliciting resource - Past birthdays
steps.description:
Now think about past ${hchildName}'s birthdays, and everything you valued and enjoyed in these birthdays.

As you think about those past birthdays with ${hchildName} now, how do you feel?

answers.text: I feel good, I love birthdays
I feel good, we had good time in birthdays
I feel the love of all the participants

steps.title: Eliciting resource - Description
steps.description:
${echo}

Great, and as you think about those past birthdays with ${hchildName} now, what images come to mind?
steps.notes: Describe it in rich detail as possible.

steps.title: Contrastive Analysis (CA)
steps.notes:
Go back and forth between the two a few times, and notice the visual, auditory, and tactile differences between the way you experience them.

What are the main differences you see, hear, and feel between the two?

steps.title: Contrastive Analysis (CA) - Location & distance
steps.description: Now check, as you look at the image(s) of the past birthdays, and the image of the next birthday in your mind, are the images in the same place in your physical space?
steps.notes: For example you might see the past birthdays closer and to your left, while the next birthday will be farther and on your right.

answers.text: One image is closer than the other
One image is higher than the other
One image is more to my right and the other to my left
One image is more in front of me than the other
The images are in the exact same place and distance

steps.title: Contrastive Analysis (CA) - Validating
steps.description:
***“The images are in the exact same place and distance”***

While it does happen that the images are in the same place and distance to begin with, it is very rare, so I just want to be thorough here, with your permission.

I want you to look at the image of the **past birthdays** again:  
${s7}

And the image of the **future birthday**:  
${s3}

And go back and forth between the two a few times. Then close your eyes and point at the location you see each of them.

Are you pointing to the **exact same place**, and the images are the **exact same distance** from you?

answers.text: I’m pointing to the exact same place
I’m pointing to two different places

steps.title: Mapping Across (MA) - Location & distance
steps.description:
Now notice what happens as you allow the image of the next birthday, to slide to the same location of the image(s) of the past birthdays.

So you see the image of the next birthday in the same location and distance as the image(s) of the past birthdays.

steps.title: Mapping Across (MA) - Remaining differences
steps.description:
${echo}

Now go back and forth between the images of the past birthday dream and the next birthday in your mind, and scan for remaining differences.

Not in the content, but in the way you are representing them internally.

Go back and forth between the two a few times, and notice if there are any visual, auditory, and tactile differences in the way you experience them.

Notice if there is something in the way you experience the past birthday, which you'd like to apply to the next birthday as well.

answers.text: I don't notice any differences between the images
I applied some of the differences

steps.title: Increasing happiness & appreciation
steps.description: As you think of ${hchildName}'s next birthday now, allow it to become brighter, more colorful and rich, so you see it vividly and crystal clear, and notice how much it increases the happiness & appreciation

answers.text: I feel more grateful this way

steps.title: Increasing happiness & appreciation
steps.description:
${echo}

Now allow it to become fuller and more three dimensional, so it gets deeper as well, and notice how much it increases the happiness & appreciation

answers.text: I feel more grateful this way

steps.title: Increasing happiness & appreciation
steps.description:
${echo}

How about motion and movement?

If the image is still, experiment in watching it as a video with motion and movement, so you see everybody moving, interacting and talking.

Also play with different speeds and notice how you feel the best experiencing it.

answers.text: I feel more grateful this way

steps.title: Increasing happiness & appreciation
steps.description:
${echo}

Let's check sound and voices next.

Try hearing the sounds and voices of everything and everybody in that experience, in rich full tones, coming from all around you in surround.

You might see and hear people sharing stories, good times and experiences they had with ${hchildName}, and all the things they love and appreciate about ${hchildName} and having them in their lives.

answers.text: I feel more grateful this way

steps.title: Increasing happiness & appreciation
steps.description:
${echo}

Now let's attend to the sense of touch and bodily sensations.

You might see some dear friends, loved ones, family members and ${hchildName}'s friends interacting in caring, gentle, or playful ways.

Some of them might hug, kiss, touch or display affection in whatever way that is appropriate.

Notice what happens as you attend to the sense of touch and bodily sensations and connection between all the people.

Also feel yourself hugging, kissing or touching your loved ones in this experience in way you enjoy, and notice which elements of those you enjoy the most.

answers.text: I feel more grateful this way

steps.title: Increasing happiness & appreciation
steps.description:
Now take a moment to notice if there are any further changes you'd like to make to this experience.

Something you'd like to add or embellish in anyway.

We can always revise this later of course, and there's no "right or wrong" here.

If you find anything that works for you, please share it below so me and future participants can all learn from you as well.

steps.title: Congruence check (CC)
steps.description: As you think about the next birthday now, do you have any objections being this way, experiencing it this way?

steps.title: Congruence check (CC)
steps.description:
${echo}

And how do you feel thinking about the next birthday now, experiencing it in this way?

steps.title: Future pacing
steps.description:
${echo}

And you can have every birthday, holiday, transition day, memorial day and every special day reminding you that good feeling,

and all that you learned, enjoyed, and have available for you, and your loved ones, for having ${hchildName} in your lives.

And you can look at all those special days, past and future, and access these good feelings whenever you wish.

And some of them you might enjoy more with glow, sparkles, glitters or bright shining light.

And of course the future ones will be somewhat vague, none of us can fully predict the future.
